html:
12.27.18  3:22 pm   how many questions have been asked?

     25

12.27.18  2:52 pm   Please go on Adam Nealy's podcast Music Analytica it will be great

     does he let anyone just go on, or does he have to invite me first

12.27.18  1:50 pm   are you going through an identity crisis at the moment? 

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

12.27.18  1:49 pm   Whats the most important thing for you in your life?

     company policy, and procedures

12.27.18  1:08 pm   should i trust the voice that tells me the project i'm working on is a dumb wrong waste of time and run away or work through it and get something done for fucking once even though the consequences of it truly being dumb and wrong seem dire

      that is the voice of nature, and you must disobey that voice

12.27.18  12:58 pm   do you believe the soul and body are seperate?

     they can be separate, and they often switch places

12.27.18  12:29 pm   How do you feel when someone make a meme about you ?

     nowadays i no longer notice, because i have turned off new-meme notifications

12.27.18  12:18 pm   Since when u open this question page ?

     about march 31, 2016

12.27.18  10:21 am   are you planing on going to more interviews and podcasts because H3's was good

     just did one

12.27.18  10:15 am   Many of your songs and answers to questions here suggest being self-aware and mindful. Any suggestions for your viewers/listeners on how to stop and think about the lives we're living? 

     don't quite stop, ..... move at a nice interesting pace

12.27.18  9:46 am   can you tell the difference in quality between an .mp3 and a .flac file?

     i've never noticed but i've also never tried to tell the difference. i suspect i could if i paid very close attention. but so far it has not been very important to me

12.27.18  8:19 am   If First We Feast contacted you to do an interview on Hot Ones, would you do it?

     only if i don't have to eat the wings nor have wings be featured anywhere in the video or in the theme of the channel it's posted on

12.27.18  7:57 am   What's that guitar looking thing with 5 I think strings in the new video I haven't seen you use it before

     i don't have anything with 5 strings. only 4 or 6

12.27.18  7:08 am   What was the first thing you said when you got to where you are?

      not a real school, it was my own school about learning how to say whatever the hell i want in a song and make it sound good regardless

12.27.18  5:56 am   What bad thing did you do?

     liked or enjoyed the artwork(s) of someone who may have done bad things which were not entirely related to the artwork(s)

12.27.18  5:07 am   hi, i would like to live, how do i get started

     birth

12.27.18  4:40 am   Do you ever trim the questions you feature here

     no

12.27.18  2:38 am   What to do when you need both total isolation and meaningful human connection? 

     answer questions on billwurtz dot com

12.27.18  2:37 am   do you have perfect pitch? meaning you can name chords and notes instantly just by hearing them.

     yes except sometimes the very first one of the week might take up to 3 to 4 instants

12.27.18  2:36 am   Did you ever reach a point in your life if you asked are you happy with what you were doing?

     it's not a point, it has been a constant state for many years now

      if you did what was your reaction and did you change anything?

     always changing and staying the same, as needed

12.27.18  2:33 am   If ever given the chance would you ever preform a live show of your music? 

     i have the chance

12.27.18  2:20 am   Why do i feel like this

     for precisely this reason

12.27.18  1:58 am   What makes you such a history nerd?

     currently nothing, i am not

12.27.18  1:24 am   How does one go about being decent at something and just being content with it.

     i don't know

12.27.18  12:58 am   would you consider doing a meet and greet sometime? as difficult as it sounds and as impossible as it seems to me, having a conversation with you would definitely make me not unhappy and i bet many others feel the same way

     meet, not greet

12.27.18  12:46 am   what's something super mundane that keeps you going/consistently brightens your day?

     the solar sun

12.27.18  12:26 am   do you have a favorite word or words

     no

     and if so what are they?

12.27.18  12:17 am   Do you ever dream of a mysterious river or no

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

12.26.18  11:40 pm   "i just did a bad thing" is such a killer jam, i didn't think it was scientifically possible to fit so many crispy & tasty licks into such a concise amount of time, and in such a coherent manner. what's your secret?!

     wearing socks and shoes at the same time

12.26.18  11:38 pm   What is purity in a figurative sense,

     like in a diagram, it would be the symbols/notation that indicates the purity

      and can real things be pure in that way?

     within the diagram yes

      Do things have to give up their figurative purity when they become real?

     it depends if the diagram is destroyed, and even if it is, the diagram could be made again

12.26.18  11:36 pm   how many times do you use the differece blend mode in a typical video of yours?

     the only typical video i have ever made will always only be my most recent one, and i can't remember how many times i used it but i would estimate about 50,000

12.26.18  11:31 pm   How do humans feel love?

     they can make it

12.26.18  11:29 pm   do you think life itself has more limits than our imagination?

     no

     if so or not so, why or why not?

     life has no limits. but yet it is also important to remember that our imagination is made of life, so there is a decent chance it could keep up

12.26.18  11:11 pm   do you believe it is good to do good

     let me perform some calculations yes

12.26.18  11:05 pm   do you believe that people misconstrue any messages that you put in your videos, if there are any messages?

     i don't know

12.26.18  10:45 pm   What does the part about turning everything pink mean?

     the song's over

12.26.18  10:44 pm   Do you listen to your own music?

     i have to listen to it while i'm making it

12.26.18  10:29 pm   what if we're in the wrong universe and there's no going back

     perhaps we could go forward

12.26.18  10:22 pm   12.26.18  6:00 pm
I feel like all of the times on that list where you were using it as a chord or note symbol shouldn't count.

     when should it count, besides at the beginning of a sentence because for me that doesn't count

12.26.18  10:16 pm   did you write "i'm about to graduate from school" when you were actually about to graduate from school or was it not

     not a real school, it was my own school about learning how to say whatever the hell i want in a song and make it sound good regardless

12.26.18  9:53 pm   will the next song be done before the end of december like you had planned?

     i don't think i ever planned that. i planned for an extra one to have been done by 12/25 which unfortunately didn't happen due to failing and failure

12.26.18  9:46 pm   what are your thoughts?

     just rainbows

12.26.18  9:40 pm   is the next song coming out 1/8/19

     yes, or die trying

12.26.18  9:33 pm   why lowercase?

     you tell me

12.26.18  9:22 pm   Would you agree with the following statements: everything matters because nothing matters, and nothing matters because everything matters?

     no

12.26.18  9:19 pm   do you ever feel insecure?

     yes

      did you feel insecure about your creations before you started posting them to the world wide web?

     no, only after

12.26.18  8:12 pm   You ever just want to play C to Dmin over and over forever? 

      you'd have to at least put G in the bass of the second chord

12.26.18  8:06 pm   Why my life sucks so much?

     because it's not quite bad enough for you to know the reason

12.26.18  7:59 pm   how do you make original music

     i still don't know but maybe if i keep doing it i will eventually figure out how i am doing it

12.26.18  7:26 pm   Do you record the live action bits or the music first?

     music
